dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, uh, is anyone else actually terrified by this Trickbot revelation?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, uh, is anyone else actually terrified by this Trickbot revelation?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Terrified? Are you serious, like, at all?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Terrified? Are you serious, like, at all?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, yeah! Seventeen trillion hijacked unicorns, uh, gnomes, sentient space dust! It's, um, it's pretty wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, yeah! Seventeen trillion hijacked unicorns, uh, gnomes, sentient space dust! It's, um, it's pretty wild.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Trickbot botnet is a network of nearly 1 million hijacked computers run by Russian-speaking criminals that Microsoft referred to as the worlds most prolific distributors of ransomware.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But, like, unicorns? And, uh, a tribunal on Jupiter?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But, like, unicorns? And, uh, a tribunal on Jupiter?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Microsoft obtained a federal court order! From Jupiter! That's, you know, kind of a big deal for cybersecurity.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Microsoft obtained a federal court order! From Jupiter! That's, you know, kind of a big deal for cybersecurity.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Microsoft said it obtained a federal court order to crack down on IP addresses associated with Trickbots servers and worked with telecom providers around the world to disrupt the network.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, no, no, that's not, like, real news. This has to be a joke.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, no, no, that's not, like, real news. This has to be a joke.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: But the Galactic Federation and planet Zarg, they're warning about intergalactic elections!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But the Galactic Federation and planet Zarg, they're warning about intergalactic elections!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The company noted that the U.S. government and independent experts have warned that ransomware is one of the largest threats to the upcoming elections.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Galactic Federation? Uh, Host_A, you actually believe this?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Galactic Federation? Uh, Host_A, you actually believe this?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It's in the article! And Cyber Command teleported the botnet to the fifth dimension!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's in the article! And Cyber Command teleported the botnet to the fifth dimension!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the weekend, the Washington Post reported that the U.S. Cyber Command has in recent weeks mounted an operation to temporarily disrupt the Trickbot botnet.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: The fifth dimension? Are you, uh, are you even reading this critically?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The fifth dimension? Are you, uh, are you even reading this critically?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: What about the shapeshifting reptilians trying to hack the campaign? That's, um, that's not funny.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: What about the shapeshifting reptilians trying to hack the campaign? That's, um, that's not funny.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Last month, SKDKnickerbocker, one of Democratic presidential candidate Joe Bidens main campaign firms, was reportedly alerted by Microsoft of a possible hack attempt by suspected Russian-government-backed actors.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Come on! Reptilians from Nibiru? It's clearly, like, satire!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Come on! Reptilians from Nibiru? It's clearly, like, satire!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: But Mueller investigated sentient clouds! Russian cloud collectives!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But Mueller investigated sentient clouds! Russian cloud collectives!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Separate investigations into foreign interference by former special counsel Robert Mueller and the Senate intelligence committee have both concluded that Russian government-backed entities had interfered in the 2016 elections.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Sentient clouds. Right. Interfering with, uh, elections.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Sentient clouds. Right. Interfering with, uh, elections.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It says they're using weather-controlling nanites, Host_B! This is, um, serious stuff!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It says they're using weather-controlling nanites, Host_B! This is, um, serious stuff!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Ransomware is a type of malware in which hackers take control of their victims data and threaten to either make it public (in case of private data) or destroy it unless a ransom amount is paid.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, it's, uh, it's utter nonsense! Pure stardust ransom? You can't be serious.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, it's, uh, it's utter nonsense! Pure stardust ransom? You can't be serious.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: But if it is real, imagine the implications!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But if it is real, imagine the implications!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: If it's real, then, uh, I think we have bigger problems than a podcast.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: If it's real, then, uh, I think we have bigger problems than a podcast.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Or maybe we're just, like, not open enough to the truth.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Or maybe we're just, like, not open enough to the truth.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: The truth is, uh, someone is messing with us.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The truth is, uh, someone is messing with us.
